3.  Much of the debate between Justices Rehnquist and Souter in Gratz
concerns whether applicants receive “individualized consideration.”
What exactly does this mean? Why is it important in this context?
4.  What are the implications of Grutterand Gratzfor admissions policies in
private colleges and universities? For preferential treatment in hiring? In
government contracts?
